author: Fadel Allassan
title: Pence says coronavirus impact in U.S. may be "most comparable" to Italy
description: Vice President Mike Pence told CNN Wednesday that White House modeling suggests "Italy may be the most comparable area to the United States" in terms of the impact of the coronavirus pandemic. Why it matters: Italy has become one of the global epicenters of t…
content:
Vice President Mike Pence told CNN Wednesday that White House modeling suggests "Italy may be the most comparable area to the United States" in terms of the impact of the coronavirus pandemic.
Why it matters: Italy has become one of the global epicenters of … [+2496 chars]
